title: di Potter WS435 Linen & Lace Paper White Wine Glass Shade, White (Pack of 6)
features: Create an enchanting atmosphere with ease just place on a wine glass with a flameless tea light
Easy to assemble, just roll and insert the tabs into the notches
For use with a flameless tea light and your own wine glass
description: Di Potter's translucent paper wine glass shades set an elegant scene with ease; Simply place on a white wine glass and add a tea light. Shades store flat or stacked to maximize space. Fits standard white wine glass. For use with battery operated tea lights or tea light fuel cells in a glass container; Tea light not included. Assembly required. Finished dimension is 4.5" diameter x 4.75" high.
